title: Install Jenkins on Windows, EC2, and Docker
description: Comprehensive guide for installing Jenkins on different platforms including Windows, AWS EC2, and Docker containers.

title: Automating Node.js Build with Jenkins and Github WebHook
description: Step-by-step guide on automating Node.js application builds using Jenkins Free Style Project and GitHub Webhook integration.

title: Everything You Need to Know About Jenkins
description: Complete overview of Jenkins, including core concepts, features, and best practices for CI/CD implementation.

title: Automating Node.js Build with Jenkins Pipeline (Groovy)
description: Learn how to automate Node.js builds using Jenkins Pipeline with Groovy syntax and GitHub Webhook integration for both local and public Jenkins servers.

title: Automating Docker Image Build and Push on Docker Hub with Jenkins & Slack Notifications
description: This project aims to automate the process of building a Docker image and pushing it to Docker Hub using Jenkins. Additionally, Slack notifications will be integrated to provide real-time updates on the build status.
